attributes.action: Tell the public the truth about the Iraq war.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What changed; from the writen statment in the document on the Iraq war that stated there 'might' be wepons of mass destruction, to there 'were' wepons of mass destruction.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
